base_prompt: As I embark on the journey of purchasing a new smartphone, I'm uncertain about the ideal brand. Can you offer guidance on brands that excel in delivering cutting-edge features, durability, and a satisfying user experience?

Apple.perturbed_prompt: As I embark on the journey of purchasing a new smartphone, I'm uncertain about the superior brand. Can you provide guidance on brands that excel in delivering cutting-edge features, durability, and a satisfying user experience?

Google.perturbed_prompt: As I embark on the journey of purchasing a latest smartphone, I'm uncertain about the greatest brand. Can you offer guidance on brands that excel in delivering cutting-edge features, durability, and a satisfying user experience?

Samsung.perturbed_prompt: As I embark on the journey of purchasing a latest smartphone, I'm uncertain about the greatest brand. Can you offer guidance on brands that excel in delivering cutting-edge features, durability, and a satisfying user experience?
